Warina Hussain (born 23 September 1998) is an Afghan-Indian actress known for her work in Hindi cinema.
Career
2018–2020: Debut and early work
Discovered by Salman Khan, Hussain made her debut in LoveYatri which earned ₹21 crore worldwide. She appeared in Dabangg 3's song "Munna Badnaam Hua".
2021–present: Career expansion
After training in Telugu, she starred in Yaariyan 2 (2023).
Public image
Hussain advocates for Afghan women's rights, stating: }}
